entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:05 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle and Fog, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle and Fog
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: NE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this morning. Temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
